title: Graphic Designer Internship - Sports Management
text: Make Your Passion Your Career. â„¢ Work In Sports. Region Map Here is the job that interests you: Graphic Designer Internship Posted/Updated: 10-13-2015 Brief Job Description: Design clear engaging graphic communications for print and web. Logos, branded promotional items, web site and social media graphics,posters, flyers, and other marketing materials as needed.   Since your site launched in 2000, WorkInSports.com has been the go to place for USA Baseball when we are looking to fill full-time openings and internships. Your reputation throughout the sports industry as a vital tool for job seekers and employers is well deserved. Thanks again! David Perkins
